import React, { Component } from 'react' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import ToggleArrow from './ToggleArrow.jsx' class Projects extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { active: 0 } } renderAcademics = () => { return (

I'm currently studying supply chain management and computer science atWashU, but I also learn about things likeWool.

) } renderProfessional = () => { return [

Projects

,
  • Amazon private labeling: lessons learned selling 2,400 earbuds on Amazon
  • Rocket Apparel: my fleece brand creation
  • InVision prototyping: example of an app prototype rapidly designed without code
,

Internships

,
  • Back Bay Audio: learned how to source private label products and get them ranked on Amazon's search engine
  • National Securities: performed research on structured products and improved automation for a $200m producer
  • Splendor Design Group: designed app prototypes using InVision Studio to demo concepts to clients. See the one linked above under 'Projects' for an example
] } renderCreative = () => { return (

Code,{' '} Design,{' '} Electronic music production

) } activeChangeHandler = (changeTo) => { this.setState({ active: changeTo }) } render() { const {active} = this.state return (
this.activeChangeHandler(0)}>

{active === 0 && this.renderAcademics()}
this.activeChangeHandler(1)}>

{active === 1 && this.renderProfessional()}
this.activeChangeHandler(2)}>

Creative

{active === 2 && this.renderCreative()}
) } } export default withRouter(Projects)
